product_name: Komperdell Walker PL Walking Staff - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The Komperdell Walker PL Walking Staff adds comfort and stability to your trek. It's a handy companion for walks in the great outdoors. 2-section aluminum alloy staff telescopes from 63 - 100 cm. External Power Lock II lever mechanism ensures easy and secure fixing with just 1 click. Ergonomic Walker Comfort grip with strap band is made of natural, ultralight cork; it provides a comfortable, nonslip, humidity-absorbing grip. The Komperdell Walker PL Walking Staff features an easy-to-change trekking basket and steel tip. Closeout.
short_description: The Komperdell Walker PL Walking Staff adds comfort and stability to your trek. It's a handy companion for walks in the great outdoors.
